attributes.additional_details:
Plans have been submitted for a bar, which will be open 7 days a week, to be constructed on the Gurdwara Sahib Complex, land which is owned by the Sri Guru Granth Sahib Ji - An application to Warwick.D.Council outlining planning permission for a proposed new Sikh Community Centre has been made. The Sikh.Com feel extremely angry&betrayed as assurances were given at an open meeting by the Chief Trustee of Gurdwara Sahib, Jaswant Virdee, and the Chair of Sikh Community Centre, Satnam Bains. Evidence shows individuals and their supporters have not only deceived the local's but have also shown the utmost disrespect to The Gurdwara by continuously misleading the congregation.Sandesh (Order) Issued by Sri Akal Takht Sahib-Any form of intoxicants (alcohol, drugs etc.) and preparation or consumption of foods such as meat, fish and eggs!(W/14/0164) can be found at:
http://planningdocuments.warwickdc.gov.uk/online-applications/applicationDetails.do?activeTab=documents&keyVal=_WARWI_DCAPR_69886
